en.RC_IDC_ANIM_COMP_TOTAL: Original Size = 100 KB Compressed Size = 10 KB Compression Ratio = 10 %
en.RC_SHADER_LOADING_STATIC: Shaders are compiling, this may take a few minutes. NOTE: This only occurs if shaders have been changed.
en.RC_IDC_TEXTURE_FEED_S: Please enter the exposed name to use for the texture feed:
en.RC_IDC_LOAD_ERROR_S: The last time ModelEditor was run it exited unexpectedly. The last model will not be reloaded.
en.RCS_ID_FILE_SAVE_AS: Save the active document with a new name Save As
en.RCS_ID_APP_ABOUT: Display program information, version number and copyright About
en.RCS_ID_APP_EXIT: Quit the application; prompts to save documents Exit
en.RCS_ID_NEXT_PANE: Switch to the next window pane Next Pane
en.RCS_ID_PREV_PANE: Switch back to the previous window pane Previous Pane
en.RCS_ID_WINDOW_SPLIT: Split the active window into panes Split
en.RCS_ID_EDIT_COPY: Copy the selection and put it on the Clipboard Copy
en.RCS_ID_EDIT_CUT: Cut the selection and put it on the Clipboard Cut
en.RCS_ID_EDIT_REPLACE: Replace specific text with different text Replace
en.RCS_ID_EDIT_SELECT_ALL: Select the entire document Select All
en.RCS_ID_EDIT_REDO: Redo the previously undone action Redo
en.RCS_ID_VIEW_TOOLBAR: Show or hide the toolbar Toggle ToolBar
en.RCS_ID_VIEW_STATUS_BAR: Show or hide the status bar Toggle StatusBar
en.RCS_AFX_IDS_SCMINIMIZE: Reduce the window to an icon
en.RCS_AFX_IDS_SCMAXIMIZE: Enlarge the window to full size
en.RCS_AFX_IDS_SCNEXTWINDOW: Switch to the next document window
en.RCS_AFX_IDS_SCPREVWINDOW: Switch to the previous document window
en.RCS_AFX_IDS_SCCLOSE: Close the active window and prompts to save the documents
en.RCS_AFX_IDS_SCRESTORE: Restore the window to normal size
en.RCS_IDC_SHOW_AXES: Show a set of unit length axes at the origin
en.RCS_IDC_CHECK_FOR_SPARKLES: Enter a mode for finding unmeshed polygons
en.RCS_IDC_SHOW_BLOOM: Enable the blooming effect while rendering
en.RCS_IDC_SHOW_SHIMMER: Enable the shimmer effect while rendering
en.RCS_IDC_ENABLE_FOG: Enables the fog effect while rendering
en.RCS_IDC_SHOW_SKELETON: Show the node skeleton of the model
en.RCS_IDC_SHOW_BSP: Show the binary space partition (BSP) of the model
en.RCS_IDC_SHOW_BOUNDING_BOX: Show the bounding and visibility boxes of the model
en.RCS_IDC_GROUND_MODEL: Ground the bottom of the model's bounding box on the ground
en.RCS_IDC_CENTRE_MODEL: Center the model's bounding box at the origin
en.RCS_IDC_SHADOWING: The level of detail for shadowing
en.RCS_IDC_DISPLAY_BKG: The mode in which to render the background
en.RCS_IDC_DISPLAY_CHOOSE_BKG_COLOUR: Set the colour of the sky...
en.RCS_IDC_TIMEOFDAY_SLIDER: The time of day at which to render the model
en.RCS_IDC_NORMALS_SIZE_SLIDER: Vary the length of the Vertex Normals, Tangents, and Binormals
en.RCS_IDC_DISPLAY_FLORA: The density of flora to use when rendering with terrain
en.RCS_IDC_SHOW_VERTEX_NORMALS: Show the normals to the vertices
en.RCS_IDC_SHOW_VERTEX_BINORMALS: Show the tangents and binormals to the vertices
en.RCS_IDC_SHOW_CUSTOM_HULL: Draws the Custom Hull of a shell
en.RCS_IDC_SHOW_EDITOR_PROXY: Shows the editor proxy model (Used in World Editor)
en.RCS_IDC_OBJECT_NAME: The file path of the currently opened model
en.RCS_IDC_OBJECT_BATCH: Can this model be batch rendered in the game
en.RCS_IDC_OBJECT_OCCLUDER: Set the object as a view occluding (for DVPS)
en.RCS_IDC_OBJECT_KIND: What substance is the model primarily made of
en.RCS_IDC_SEARCH_TEXT: The search filter for the selection
en.RCS_IDC_ANIM_NAME: The name of the current animation
en.RCS_IDC_ANIM_FRAME_RATE: The frame rate at which to play the animation (fps)
en.RCS_IDC_ANIM_FIRST: The first frame of the animation to play
en.RCS_IDC_ANIM_LAST: The last frame of the animation to play
en.RCS_IDC_ANIM_FRAME_RATE_SLIDER: The frame rate at which to play the animation (fps)
en.RCS_IDC_ANIM_BLEND: The blend weighting for the selected node
en.RCS_IDC_ANIM_BLEND_SLIDER: The blend weighting for the selected node
en.RCS_IDC_ANIM_REMOVE_BLEND: Remove the blend weighting for this node
en.RCS_IDC_ANIM_SAVE_FRAME_RATE: Save the current frame rate for this animation
en.RCS_IDC_ANIM_CHANGE_ANIM: Select a different animation file to use...
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_MRU: The three most recently used actions.
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_NAME: The name of the action Needs to be a Python safe name (i.e. alphanumeric)
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_ANIM: The name of the animation used for the current action
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_TRACK: The track number to use for the action's animation
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_OWN_TRACK: This action's animation will always be on its own track
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_CHANGE_ANIM: Select a different animation to use...
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_LOOP: Set the action to be looping
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_MOVE: Update the entity's position during animation.
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_TRIGGER_CAPS_ON_SEL: Select the capabilities which must be on for the action to trigger...
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_IMPACT: Update the entity's position when animation ends.
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_COORD: This action requires interaction with another entity
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_TRIGGER_CAPS_OFF_SEL: Select the capabilities which must be off for the action to trigger...
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_CANCEL_CAPS_ON_SEL: Select the capabilities which must be on for the action to cancel...
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_CANCEL_CAPS_OFF: The action matcher capabilities which must be off for the action to cancel
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_PROMOTE_MOTION: The model will inherit movement from the action
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_SCALE_PLAYBACK_SPEED: Should the animation speed be scaled with the entity movement speed
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_FEET_FOLLOW_DIRECTION: The model should face in the same direction as the entity
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_CANCEL_CAPS_OFF_SEL: Select the capabilities which must be off for the action to cancel...
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_CANCEL_AUX1_SLDR: The entity turn range (deg) for the action to cancel
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_CANCEL_YAW_SLDR: The entity direction range (deg) for the action to cancel
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_TRIGGER_SPEED_SLDR: The entity speed range (m/s) for the action to trigger Negative for falling
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_TRIGGER_AUX1_SLDR: The entity turn range (deg) for the action to trigger
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_CANCEL_SPEED_SLDR: The entity speed range (m/s) for the action to cancel
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_TRIGGER_YAW_SLDR: The entity direction range (deg) for the action to trigger
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_TRIGGER_SPEED_MIN: The minimum entity speed (m/s) for the action to trigger
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_TRIGGER_SPEED_MAX: The maximum entity speed (m/s) for the action to trigger
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_TRIGGER_AUX1_MIN: The minimum entity turn (deg) for the action to trigger
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_TRIGGER_AUX1_MAX: The maximum entity turn (deg) for the action to trigger
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_TRIGGER_YAW_MIN: The minimum entity direction (deg) for the action to trigger
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_TRIGGER_YAW_MAX: The maximum entity direction (deg) for the action to trigger
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_TRIGGER_CAPS_ON: The action matcher capabilities which must be on for the action to trigger
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_ONE_SHOT: The action matcher should cancel action after one play
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_TRIGGER_CAPS_OFF: The action matcher capabilities which must be off for the action to trigger
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_CANCEL_SPEED_MIN: The minimum entity speed (m/s) for the action to cancel
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_CANCEL_SPEED_MAX: The maximum entity speed (m/s) for the action to cancel
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_CANCEL_AUX1_MIN: The minimum entity turn (deg) for the action to cancel
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_CANCEL_AUX1_MAX: The maximum entity turn (deg) for the action to cancel
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_CANCEL_YAW_MIN: The minimum entity direction (deg) for the action to cancel
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_CANCEL_YAW_MAX: The maximum entity direction (deg) for the action to cancel
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_CANCEL_CAPS_ON: The action matcher capabilities which must be on for the action to cancel
en.RCS_IDC_LOD_MIN: The minimum distance for which to render the selected model
en.RCS_IDC_LOD_BAR: The current LOD distance setup for the model
en.RCS_IDC_LOD_HIDDEN: Hide the selected model in the LOD list
en.RCS_IDC_LOD_VIRTUAL_DIST: Use the LOD distance for determining the LOD model to render only
en.RCS_IDC_LOD_MAX: The maximum distance for which to render the selected model
en.RCS_IDC_LOD_LIST: The current LOD distance setup for the model
en.RCS_IDC_LIGHTS_LIST: A list of the available lights to use
en.RCS_IDC_LIGHTS_SETUPS: A list of the recently used lighting setups
en.RCS_IDC_LIGHTS_CAMERA: Lock the light direction and position to the camera
en.RCS_IDC_LIGHTS_MODELS: Show the light controller in the view
en.RCS_IDC_MATERIALS_MATERIAL: The name to use for the current material
en.RCS_IDC_MATERIALS_MATTER: The dye name for the currently selected tint Needs to be a Python safe name (i.e. alphanumeric)
en.RCS_IDC_MATERIALS_TINT: The name of the currently selected tint
en.RCS_IDC_MATERIALS_TREE: A list of the materials/tints available in this model
en.RCS_IDC_MATERIALS_FX_LIST: Use a recently used effect for the selected material/tint
en.RCS_IDC_MATERIALS_FX_SEL: Select a new effect for the selected material/tint...
en.RCS_IDC_MATERIALS_PREVIEW: Render the selected material on a preview object
en.RCS_IDC_MATERIALS_PREVIEW_LIST: The object on which to preview the material
en.RCS_IDC_MATERIALS_PREVIEW_RECT: A preview of the currently selected material
en.RCS_IDC_MATERIALS_TECHNIQUE: Preview the material using a different technique
en.RCS_IDC_MSG_SHOW_DATE: Show the date of the messages
en.RCS_IDC_MSG_SHOW_TIME: Show the time of the messages
en.RCS_IDC_MSG_SHOW_PRIORITY: Show the priority of the messages
en.RCS_IDC_NEW_TINT_NAME: The name of the new tint to create
en.RCS_IDC_NEW_TINT_FX_CHECK: Use an effect file for the new tint
en.RCS_IDC_NEW_TINT_FX_LIST: Use a recently used effect for the new tint
en.RCS_IDC_NEW_TINT_FX_SEL: Select an effect for the new tint...
en.RCS_IDC_NEW_TINT_MFM_CHECK: Use an MFM file for the new tint
en.RCS_IDC_NEW_TINT_MFM_LIST: Use a recently used MFM for the new tint
en.RCS_IDC_NEW_TINT_MFM_SEL: Select an MFM for the new tint...
en.RCS_IDC_PREFS_SHOW_SPLASH_SCREEN: When ModelEditor is started show a splash screen
en.RCS_IDC_PREFS_LOAD_LAST_MODEL: When ModelEditor is started load the last used model
en.RCS_IDC_PREFS_LOAD_LAST_LIGHTS: When ModelEditor is started load the last used lighting setup
en.RCS_IDC_PREFS_ZOOM_ON_LOAD: Zoom to the extents of the model when loading
en.RCS_IDC_PREFS_ANIMATE_ZOOM: Use an animated zoom to extents
en.RCS_IDC_PREFS_LOCK_LOD: Lock all the LOD models of the model
en.RCS_IDC_PREFS_REGEN_BB: Regenerate the visibility box for the model when loading if needed
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_BLEND_IN: The blend in time for the animation (sec)
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_BLEND_OUT: The blend out time for the animation (sec)
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_BLEND_IN_SLIDER: The blend in time for the animation (sec)
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_BLEND_OUT_SLIDER: The blend out time for the animation (sec)
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_TRIGGER_FALLING: Whether the model needs to be falling for the action to trigger
en.RCS_IDC_ACT_CANCEL_FALLING: Whether the model needs to be falling for the action to cancel
en.RCS_IDC_OBJECT_PROXY_REMOVE: Remove the current proxy for this model
en.RCS_IDC_OBJECT_PROXY_SEL: Select a proxy model to be used in WorldEditor
en.RCS_IDC_OBJECT_PROXY: The proxy model to be used in WorldEditor Supports drag-and-drop of *.model files
